data.name: DesktopState
data.value: Langademy provides videocalls between Langademy contacts specifying the conversation language. When you log in to Langademy you can use your state to let your contacts know in which languages you want to speak. If you don’t want to receive any calls, just set your state to busy. And remember that videocalls may have an impact on your Time Bank account.

data.name: HelpAssistanceTitle
data.value: Langademy in 3 steps

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep1F1
data.value: Get to the Language Roulette, select a language and start practicing it using video call technology.

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep1F2
data.value: You can create meetups to meet with more people at the Language Roulette

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep2F1
data.value: Timebanking:

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep2F2
data.value: If you teach your native language you will be rewarded with time for your account, and if you practice other languages you will we spending time from the time bank.

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep2F3
data.value: You will start with 5 free hours, and each month Langademy will give you 2 additional hours.

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep3F1
data.value: In Langademy you can make videocalls with your contacts and decide which language you are going to practice.

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep3F2
data.value: Your state shows the languages you have defined in your profile. When these languages are enabled or disabled in your state, your contacts will know that you only want to receive calls in those languages that are enabled.

data.name: HelpAssistanteStep3F3
data.value: If you don't want to receive calls, set your state to busy. Remember that these calls can affect your Time Bank account.

data.name: HelpDontShow
data.value: Don't show again

data.name: HelpShowhelpagain
data.value: You can show this help at any time by clicking {0} at the footer of the page

data.name: HelpString
data.value: Help

data.name: HelpWelcome
data.value: Welcome to Langademy!

data.name: LangademyState
data.value: Langademy state

data.name: LangrouletteIntro
data.value: The Language Roulette is where you can go to exchange languages with a native. Select a room and start practicing your favourite language! We will find a conversation partner for you! Remember that you can check the meetup board to know when the Language Roulette meetups take place.

data.name: TimeBankDescription
data.value: The Time Bank is a way to make language exchange fair for everyone at Langademy. This is how it works:

data.name: TimeBankF1
data.value: You will begin with 5 hours, and every month you will receive {0} extra hours.

data.name: TimeBankF2
data.value: By default, you will not be able to accumulate more than 10 hours in your Time Bank account.

data.name: TimeBankF3
data.value: Invite your friends and you will get 30 extra minutes for each friend that is registered with your invitation. You can also earn hours for your Time Bank account by following Langademy on Twitter and Facebook (+ 60 minutes).

data.name: TimeBankF4
data.value: When you practice a language that is not your native language, you spend time from your Time Bank account. And if you speak to a non-native in your native language (minimum level: C2), you will be rewarded with time for your account.

data.name: TimeBankF5
data.value: Calls that are shorter than a minute have no cost

data.name: TimeBankTitle
data.value: Time Bank
